shortdesc.ph: Gets the remote playback volume of the music file.
Gets the remote playback volume of the music file.
Gets the remote playback volume of the music file.
Gets the remote playback volume of the music file.

section.p: This API helps you troubleshoot volume-related issues.
This API helps developers troubleshoot volume-related issues.
This interface helps developers troubleshoot volume-related issues.
This API helps developers troubleshoot volume-related issues.
section.note: You need to call this method after calling and receiving the onAudioMixingStateChanged(AudioMixingStatePlaying) callback.
You need to call this method after calling and receiving the onAudioMixingStateChanged(AudioMixingStatePlaying) callback.
You need to call this method after calling and receiving the onAudioMixingStateChanged(audioMixingStatePlaying) callback.
You need to call this method after calling and receiving the OnAudioMixingStateChanged(AUDIO_MIXING_STATE_PLAYING) callback.

ul.li: ≥ 0: Returns the volume value if the method call succeeds. The range is [0,100].
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
≥ 0: Success. Returns the volume value, range is [0,100].
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
≥ 0: The method call succeeds and returns the volume value, range is [0,100].
< 0: The method call fails. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
≥ 0: Success. Returns the volume value, range is [0,100].
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
